name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G16 (2025)
description: Ultra-thin gaming laptop with 16-inch 240Hz OLED, RTX 5070 Ti, and AMD Ryzen 9. Gorgeous design that does not scream gamer.

reviews.review_text: Gaming laptop I am not embarrassed to use at coffee shops.
OLED gaming on the go. Colors pop like crazy.
Fans get loud under load but performance is great.
